title: Women's Tennis Falls to Sanderson
content:
The Lady Caps hosted Sanderson on Tuesday, September 1 at 3:30pm. The Lady Caps fought hard on the hot, sunny afternoon but Sanderson ultimately prevailed 7-2. Broughton's overall record moves to 4-1 and to 2-1 in the Cap 8. The Lady Caps are away at Wakefield on Tuesday, September 3 at 3:30. Come support your Women's Tennis team!
SINGLES:
S. Tanik (SAN) def. H. Cox (BRO), 7-5, 6-0; D. Cannon (SAN) def. A. Austin (BRO), 6-0, 6-0; B. Waters (BRO) def. A. Holshouser (SAN), 6-3, 6-3; S. Anthony (SAN) def. M. Hardesty (BRO), 6-3, 6-2; W. Burrus (BRO) def. K. Griffin (SAN) 6-2, 6-2; H. Buck (SAN) def. K. Burroughs (BRO) 6-1, 6-1
DOUBLES:
Tanik/Anthony def. Cox/Austin, 8-4; Cannon/Holshauser def. Waters/Hardesty, 8-1; Griffin/Buck def.  Burrus/Bennett 8-1.
